title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 10025.3 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 § 10025.3 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 709(2)(n), 710; Public

Officers Law, § 87(1)(b)

The New York State Office of Homeland Security has
promulgated these rules in accordance with article 6 of the New York State

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§
10025.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
